name: Nom
description:
YOU ARE THE MONSTER!

In this idle game you click on yourself (the big brown monster) to eat humans jumping from the lighthouse in order to hire minor monsters to raid the village for you! Oh! You'll have to defend them from missiles too!

FEATURES INCLUDE:

  • A 16:9 aspect ratio and 720p native resolution!
  • Extremely realistic (*cough*) blood and explosion particles!
  • An optional camera-powerded "You-Are-The-Monster"-Mode!
  • 3 exciting minor monsters to hire!

LISTEN TO THE INCREDIBLE MUSIC ON SOUNDCLOUD!

VISIT THE GAME'S LUDUM DARE PAGE!

[CLICK]
